description: Harbour vizualisation of boat and quay using canvas panels

targets.rawSql: SELECT slot, state FROM quay where machine_id = $id ORDER BY slot LIMIT 50
SELECT slot, container_id FROM quay where machine_id = $id ORDER BY slot LIMIT 50
SELECT slot, state FROM cargomanifest where ship_id = $id ORDER BY slot LIMIT 50
SELECT slot, container_id FROM cargomanifest where ship_id = $id ORDER BY slot LIMIT 50
select roll from ship where id = $id;
select draft from ship where id = $id;

list.description: Id to differentiate between the harbours of the different groups
list.label: id
list.name: id

title: harbour-viz
